name: Bird Rope Perch 24 Inch, Colorful Cotton Parrot Bungee Swing, Bendable Cage Climbing Toy & Stand Accessories for Parakeets, Cockatiels, Conures, Lovebirds
short_description: Bendable & Shapeable Fun: Featuring a strong, flexible internal wire core, this 24-inch bird rope perch can be twisted into spirals, curves, or loops. Create a constantly changing landscape inside the cage to keep your feathered friend entertained and stimulate their curiosity

Gentle on Bird Feet: Wrapped in soft, colorful cotton threads, this comfortable perch provides a cozy alternative to hard wood or plastic stands. It helps relieve foot pressure and prevents sores (bumblefoot), making it an ideal resting spot for parakeets, cockatiels, and conures

Vibrant Cage Enrichment: The bright, multi-colored design (random color sent) instantly livens up any bird habitat. It serves not only as a functional standing perch but also as an attractive chew toy that alleviates boredom and reduces plucking behavior

Promotes Exercise & Balance: Designed to mimic swaying tree branches, this bungee swing challenges your bird's balance and coordination. The textured cotton surface offers excellent grip, encouraging climbing, swinging, and active play to maintain healthy muscles

Secure & Easy Installation: Equipped with durable metal wing nuts on both ends, the rope attaches firmly to any standard wire cage bars without tools. It holds its shape securely under the weight of small to medium birds like budgies, lovebirds, and caiques
